name: pantheist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who believes in many or all gods, or believes that God exists in, and is the same as, all things, animals, and people within the universe: The pantheist believes a divine Unity exists. Worship is not acceptable religious practice for pantheists. Compare
agnostic
atheist
deist
monotheist
nontheist
theist
More examplesFewer examplesThe pantheist should not pray to or worship a theistic God.As a pantheist, my beliefs do not include a personal afterlife.Pantheists usually deny the existence of a personal God.

believing in many or all gods, or believing that God exists in, and is the same as, all things, animals, and people within the universe, or relating to this belief: She declared herself "more pantheist than atheist".
